none: media/user/SCRAPE/terminal-escape-scrape/2023-12-pusdrainer/extracted/Pusdrainer/02 Let This Desire Burn In You
media/user/SCRAPE/terminal-escape-scrape/2023-12-pusdrainer/extracted/Pusdrainer/03 Only Stopping To Fall (No Faith Mix)

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 02, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 This tape...this tape sounds like slogging through this day. PUSDRAINER in 2013 created the soundtrack for this day in 2023 without even the most casual eye towards the future. Because in 2013, PUSDRAINER were clearly focused on trying to get through their day, and it doesn't sound like it was easy. Today isn't either, and tomorrow will likely be a motherfucker, but take comfort knowing that someone has been there before. And they got through it. "Only Stopping To Fall (No Faith Mix)" is the track that will remind you that you can walk even after you stop. To fall. ONLY STOPPING TO FALL
